text: Grateful for everyone who came out to our #WinWithWarren organizing house party in Oskaloosa, IA today. Our movement begins with fired-up grassroots supporters all across the country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7i1revWkAEi2fV.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7i1tNoWsAEnMh6.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7i1vZ7XYAEYCsj.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7i1w7xWkAAe6HV.jpg

This exchange is a promising peek into what growth looks like in our national discourse on race.

Thanks for sharing your experience in this powerful moment, @CodyRhodes. https://twitter.com/andreashale/status/1132644624030240769 QT @AndreasHale “I told Brandi one time that I don’t see color and she said ‘well, then you don’t see my experience,’” - @CodyRhodes on how being in an interracial marriage has helped with diversity in @AEWrestling and why diversity will be a way of life and not a publicity stunt. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1132644471894503424/pu/img/xYReJvAZN0xxtPIN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1132644471894503424/pu/vid/320x568/XLTFNHOlVm4t6q1l.mp4?tag=9

I say to the right-wing extremists who want to roll back Roe v. Wade: Abortion is a constitutional right and we are going to keep it that way. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7cTw7CXYAIS2fV.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1132392543038201857/vid/320x320/SHaxp3Yf0yPHMwaA.mp4?tag=12

When our communities are hit by storms, floods, or hurricanes, we reach out and help our neighbors. But Washington is so broken that one Republican congressman is holding up a disaster relief package to help struggling families. That's not who we are as Americans. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7gcwvfWwAASVZN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1132686362589712385/vid/320x320/3iVpEQih-dg5Y0bg.mp4?tag=12

This week I released a plan that would force corporations to prove they are not engaging in pay discrimination. The gender pay gap won’t quickly close on its own unless we take action. Corporations must be held accountable.

I have been criticized recently for my foreign policy record so let me repeat: I make no apologies for opposing the wars in Vietnam, Iraq, Yemen and now trying to prevent a war with Iran. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7hRJWmW0AI3jpQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1132743881085325312/vid/320x320/XVtMCzfAGGj-nqVu.mp4?tag=12

⬇️
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/national-bail-out-1?amount=$100 https://twitter.com/franklinleonard/status/1132692933176467458 QT @franklinleonard I fear that someone’s gonna make Hope’s Choice as a movie. https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1132692371005534208

Last year's Camp Fire was the deadliest and most destructive wildfire in California’s history. It's outrageous that months later, many survivors are homeless & struggling to find temporary housing.
 
FEMA must ensure survivors receive the housing assistance they need.

What gets me is news breaks that this woman is weighing committing a crime before Congress &it’s getting framed by the NYT as some Lifetime drama called “Hope’s Choice.”

This is a fmr admin official considering participating in a coverup led by the President.

Treat her equally. https://twitter.com/nytpolitics/status/1131928102601465857 QT @nytpolitics Hope Hicks, one of the best-known but least visible former members of President Trump’s White House staff, is facing an existential question: whether to comply with a congressional subpoena https://trib.al/WBg72lg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7VqnEVW0AEkX7X.jpg

Highly profitable corporations like McDonald's are paying wages so low that many of their workers need food stamps, Medicaid, and public housing to survive. That is unacceptable.

If I'm elected president, trust me, every worker in this country will make at least $15 an hour. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7gG-EsX4AEQN9_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1132661743614873601/vid/320x320/eyrG5WrFZxm4i-F9.mp4?tag=12

🎶We need a Green New Deal/
To save our planet for sure/
Lots of sun and wind power,
Will help us endure! 🎶

Jerry is 97 years old and dedicates his Instagram to spreading joy and acts of kindness. This is his second song of support, and he writes them himself! 😭

We are failing victims of sexual assault. We must listen to their stories, then fight for justice. Do not ignore these strong survivors.
https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1131609496814522378 QT @nytimes Rape kits so neglected they grew mold. Calls for help that went unanswered. Witnesses and victims who were never interviewed. These are just a handful of the claims that sexual assault survivors are making against law enforcement in courts around the U.S. https://trib.al/V1ZTjc2

It’s past time that we fulfill our nation’s promise to honor the service of Filipino veterans who fought alongside American soldiers, sailors, and marines during World War II and reunite them with their families. #APAHM https://twitter.com/maziehirono/status/1131283460155412481 QT @maziehirono I'm proud to introduce the Filipino Veterans Family Reunification Act with @lisamurkowski to fulfill our nation’s promise to honor Filipino World War II veterans’ service to our country and reunite these families. #APAHM
More here: https://www.hirono.senate.gov/news/press-releases/hirono-case-murkowski-young-reintroduce-bicameral-legislation-to-reunite-filipino-world-war-ii-veterans-with-their-families

The House has already passed a bill to reauthorize and expand the Violence Against Women Act—but now it’s in the Senate's legislative graveyard.
 
This makes no sense - expanding protections for sexual assault survivors shouldn't be about politics. We must pass it in the Senate.

All rights are women’s rights. Thank you Burlington, Iowa, for having me for this important conversation about protecting reproductive freedom. Right now, we’re in a dark place, but moments like this leave me hopeful. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7g0iKyX4AAPkLK.jpg

These bans won’t end abortion; they will just end safe and legal abortions.
https://twitter.com/NARAL/status/1131955768364867584 QT @NARAL Both women and children have worse health outcomes in places that restrict abortion access. Choosing to cut off abortion access is choosing to hurt families and communities. https://www.popsci.com/restricting-abortion-public-health #StopTheBans

Yup. Where’s the “no angel” take now?

In the immediate aftermath of shootings, media routinely post menacing photos of people-of-color victims + dredge up any questionable thing they’d ever done.

But when Hope Hicks considers not complying w a subpoena, it’s glamour shot time. https://twitter.com/soledadobrien/status/1132602097994747909 QT @soledadobrien This is a good example of bias in the @nytimes: a picture of a person who is considering not complying with a subpoena is basically a glam shot, and it’s framed as a thoughtful, perfectly equal choice. https://twitter.com/nytpolitics/status/1131928102601465857

The Trump Administration continues to break up families and deport people who pose no harm to public safety. This is unconscionable. As president, I will reinstate DACA and implement DAPA to protect Dreamers and their parents from deportation.  
https://chicago.suntimes.com/platform/amp/news/2019/5/24/18639166/ice-deportation-chicago-daca-parents-colombia-immigration

RT @ninaturner The residents of @DenmarkWaterCri thanking @BernieSanders for supplying water and being an ally in their fight for clean water, which should be a minimal expectation in this country. SBS is committed to helping communities solve this life-altering problem. #Bernie2020 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1132740495543885825/pu/img/bAYQs8cwDGYOZ52u.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1132740495543885825/pu/vid/320x568/oJtuJzq-Y4IRE_Hv.mp4?tag=9

Our economy isn’t working for most Americans. An unexpected expense shouldn’t throw your life into financial chaos. My LIFT Act will give families up to $500 per month to help make ends meet. 
https://www.washingtonpost.com/us-policy/2019/05/23/americans-arent-ready-weather-sustained-downturn-new-report-shows/

Saddened to hear of the passing of longtime Midland County Sheriff Gary Painter. Gary was a pillar of the Midland community & his presence will be missed. Please join Heidi & me in lifting up his family in prayer during this difficult time. https://www.mrt.com/news/local/article/County-Painter-passes-away-Sunday-morning-13897559.php?utm_campaign=CMS%20Sharing%20Tools%20(Mobile)&utm_source=t.co&utm_medium=referral via @mwtnews

How many kids suffer from mercury, lead, and soot in their air? And the most polluting incinerators in America hurt low-income and minority neighborhoods the most. We need clean air and water for all—not a government that works on behalf of polluters. https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2019/may/21/us-pollution-incinerators-waste-burning-plants-report

I have been very tough on #China but I can’t accuse them of stealing our fireworks. They did kind of invent it about 1500 years ago.

In his order, Judge Reeves wrote "here we go again." A lot of us feel that way. Time & time again, politicians have tried to strip women of their rights. Enough of this. We need to codify Roe v. Wade, repeal the Hyde Amendment & vow to never go backwards. https://www.essence.com/news/federal-judge-blocks-mississippi-fetal-heartbeat-bill/

Earlier this week I reintroduced my Maternal CARE Act to combat the maternal mortality crisis facing Black women.

Because what’s good for our Black mothers is good for our babies, families, and communities—and it’s good for the entire country.

Congress passed a war powers resolution to end U.S. involvement and there is bipartisan opposition to the Saudi-led war.
